name: Soccer Cup Champions League Edition
description:
Live the European Clubs Championship while it is played.
Choose your nteam and play the matches of the real draw until the final.

Served by superbs 3D graphics, animations and sounds, Euro Clubs League Football is based on a highly realistic physic engine in which football moves have been coded by football fans.

Main Features
-Full 3D environnement
-Rea European Clubs Championship Draw
-5 different team strategy
-Easy tu use paddle for best gameplay
-game in your language
